title: About GTMVP - Company & Founder Information
content:
# About GTMVP

## Company Overview
GTMVP (Go-To-Market Verified Partners) is an AI automation and ads management company founded in 2020, headquartered in Dover, Delaware.

## Mission
Bridge the gap between cutting-edge technology and growing businesses, creating solutions that deliver measurable results through the perfect blend of AI innovation and strategic marketing expertise.

## Vision
Democratize access to world-class technology and talent, making enterprise-level solutions available to every growing business regardless of size or budget.

## Key Metrics & Achievements
- 350+ businesses transformed
- $50M+ in revenue generated for clients
- 98% client satisfaction rate
- 24/7 support availability

## Founder: Steve Kaplan

### Background
- Over 10 years of experience in digital strategy and AI-driven marketing
- Expertise in scaling multimillion-dollar campaigns and building AI-powered solutions
- Background as Fractional CMO designing demand generation strategies

### Professional Accomplishments
- Managed $2M monthly advertising spend
- Achieved up to 30x Return on Ad Spend (ROAS)
- Delivered $5.5M in direct sales over five years
- Built and scaled global teams with consistent year-over-year growth
- Expert in Google Ads, Facebook Ads, and LinkedIn Ads

## Core Values

### Innovation First
Create industry-leading solutions rather than follow trends

### Partnership Mindset
Position as growth partners, not vendors

### Results Obsessed
Design every strategy and automation for measurable growth

### Quality Control
Test automations 50+ times; vet developers through 6 evaluation rounds

### 24/7 Monitoring
Real-time system oversight with instant alerts and proactive maintenance

### Continuous Improvement
Invest 20% of time in research and development

## Service Commitments
- 2-hour response time guarantee
- Dedicated success manager per client
- Performance guarantees on all services
- Transparent reporting and analytics
- Risk-free trial periods

## Services
1. Home Services Automation
2. SaaS Developer Matching
3. Facebook & Google Ads Management
4. MVP Launch Services

## Contact Information
- Phone: (954) 228-5908
- Email: hello@gtmvp.com
- Location: Dover, Delaware
